verses.roman:
īṣat hāsiyā prabhu kailā āliṅgana
sabāre śunāñā kahena madhura vacana

synonyms: īṣat hāsiyā—smiling slightly; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kailā āliṅgana—embraced; sabāre—all others; śunāñā—causing to hear; kahena—began to say; madhura vacana—sweet words.
translation: Smiling slightly, the Lord embraced him and spoke sweet words so that others would also hear.
